info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 06 at 1:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by high rainfall rates is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Fergus and Judith Basin. In north central Montana, Blaine, Chouteau and Hill. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Locally heavy rain from thunderstorms may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall rates exceeding 1 inch per hour are possible with thunderstorms through Wednesday evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
